Mail.HelpWantedBoard: Hey there @!^^The townsfolk wanted me to let you know that they would be willing to bring their requests to your farm if you had a Help Wanted Board there. If you would like to get one, come stop by my shop.^^    -Robin
Mail.SpecialOrderBoard: Hey there @!^^The townsfolk wanted me to let you know that they would be willing to bring their important requests to your farm if you had a Special Order Board there. If you would like to get one, come stop by my shop.^^    -Robin
Mail.QIQuestBoard: Hey Kid,^^I figured I would take the time to let you know that I'll stop by your farm if you have a Qi's Order Board to tell you what my quests are. If you would like to get one, go see the Wizard.^^    -Mr. QI
Building.HelpWantedBoard.name: Peronal Help Wanted Board
Building.HelpWantedBoard.description: A help wanted board for you farm.
Building.SpecialOrderBoard.name: Peronal Special Orders Board
Building.SpecialOrderBoard.description: A special orders board for you farm.
Building.QIQuestBoard.name: Peronal QI's quest Board
Building.QIQuestBoard.description: A special board showing Mr. QI's quests.
